page.title: 11AN "ADVERT" FOR HAMPTON
page.content: {************************************** {COME AND LIVE IN HAMPTON { WHERE THE GRASS IS GREENER! { ******************************* Many parks eg. Bushy Park for picnics, sports, walks and nature study. Hampton Court is a fun filled day out for all ages, with a delightful blaze of colour all year round. Many restaurants and pubs where you can meet and eat; Christian churches of many denominations; good transport facilities. Hampton has a wide selection of schools, infants, junior, comprehensive and private. There are also playgroups and clubs to join. Nearby flows the River Thames with it's countless recreational facilities, yes, { HAMPTON IS A GREAT PLACE TO LIVE! {**************************************
